title: CVE-2023-30587 Process-based permissions can be bypassed with the "inspector" module.
content:
https://hackerone.com/reports/1962701 Restrictions set with the new process based permission flag can by bypassed with the built-in inspector module.
Impact
Permission Model is a mechanism for restricting access to specific resources during execution. This bypasses those restrictions.
steps: Identify a Node.js application that uses process-based permission flags to restrict access to specific resources.
Use the built-in inspector module to bypass these restrictions and access the restricted resources.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows bypassing process-based permission flags in Node.js applications by using the built-in inspector module, thereby gaining unauthorized access to restricted resources.
reason: The vulnerability involves understanding the interaction between process-based permissions and the inspector module, which is a non-obvious interaction. However, the attack itself is straightforward once this interaction is known.
